tasks.start: deno task prepare && deno run -A --env main.ts
tasks.dev: deno task prepare && deno run -A --env --watch main.ts
tasks.dev:debug: deno task prepare && deno run -A --inspect-wait --env --watch main.ts
tasks.prepare: deno task build:emby-scripts && deno task build:jellyfin-scripts && deno task build:webui
tasks.build:jellyfin-scripts: deno task --cwd ../../packages/jellyfin build:scripts && deno task copy:jellyfin-scripts
tasks.build:emby-scripts: deno task --cwd ../../packages/emby build:scripts && deno task copy:emby-scripts
tasks.build:webui: deno task --cwd ../web build && deno task copy:webui
